mapper.select: SELECT t.id, c.id clusterId, c.`name` clusterName, i.`name` instanceName, i.ip, t.`port`, t.type, t.master_name, t.max_memory, t.`password` FROM instance_redis t LEFT JOIN instance i ON i.id = t.instance_id AND i.del_flag = #{condition.delFlag} LEFT JOIN cluster c ON c.id = t.cluster_id AND c.del_flag = #{condition.delFlag} WHERE t.del_flag = #{condition.delFlag} AND t.cluster_id = #{condition.clusterId}
